mainPage.name: My Portfolio
mainPage.title: About Me
paragraphs: Ever since I was a kid, I’ve been fascinated by how things work especially computers. My curiosity led me to programming, where I found a way to bring hardware to life through software. Inspired by the inner workings of technology, I pursued a degree in Computer Science to better understand and contribute to this rapidly evolving field.

As a first-generation college student, my path hasn’t been easy. I used to wake up at 4 AM every day to cross the border from Mexico to the U.S. for school. That determination has shaped who I am today—a driven learner with a deep appreciation for every opportunity to grow.

My passion for technology started with video games. Getting my first console sparked a lifelong interest in game development. Since then, I’ve gained hands-on experience building games in Unity and Unreal, and I’m proficient in several programming languages.

At my core, I’m a curious and persistent learner. If something grabs my interest, I’ll dig deep until I understand it. Whether it's CPUs, code, or game engines, I’m always seeking knowledge and striving to improve.
